scripts.watch: clear; echo "* * * *  WATCH  * * * *"; NODE_ENV=development npm run -s watch:all
scripts.build: clear; echo "* * * *  BUILD  * * * *"; NODE_ENV=production npm run -s build:all
scripts.build:all: npm run -s clean && (npm run -s build:css & npm run -s build:assets & npm run -s build:js) && npm run -s build:html && npm run -s build:finish
scripts.build:css: for file in $npm_package_config_less_entry_files; do lessc $file | cleancss --s0 | npm run -s partial:replaceAssets > ./build/$npm_package_version/css/$(basename $file | sed -e 's~less~css~') ; done && echo ---------CSS------------`date +%r`
scripts.build:js: npm run -s build:js:browserify | npm run -s partial:replaceAssets | npm run -s partial:uglify > ./build/$npm_package_version/build.js && echo ---------JS-------------`date +%r`
scripts.build:js:browserify: browserify $npm_package_config_js_entry_file --extension=.js --extension=.jsx -x 'augur.js' -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ] -t [envify purge]
scripts.build:html: cat ./src/index.html | npm run -s partial:replaceAssets | npm run -s build:html:inline_sources > $(npm run -s partial:index_filename) && echo ---------HTML-----------`date +%r`
scripts.watch:all: npm run -s clean && (npm run -s watch:css & npm run -s watch:assets & npm run -s watch:js & npm run -s watch:html)
scripts.watch:js: watchify $npm_package_config_js_entry_file --extension=.js --extension=.jsx -x 'augur.js' -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ] -t [envify purge] --debug -o 'exorcist ./build/$npm_package_version/build.js.map | npm run -s partial:replaceAssets > ./build/$npm_package_version/build.js && echo ---------WATCHIFY--------`date +%r`'
scripts.clean: rimraf ./build/* && mkdir -p ./build/$npm_package_version && mkdir -p ./build/$npm_package_version/css && touch $(npm run -s partial:index_filename) && echo ---------CLEAN----------`date +%r`
